title: Triund
subtitle: Weekend ridge walk
about: Triund is a short, iconic ridge trek above McLeodganj that offers sweeping views of the Dhauladhar range. It’s popular for weekend trips, sunset camps and easy ridge-side walks accessible to most hikers.
seo_description: Short ridge trek offering panoramic views of the Dhauladhar range. Perfect for weekend hikers and first-time trekkers.

trek_places.name: McLeodganj
trek_places.short: Vibrant hill town and trek gateway
trek_places.about: McLeodganj is a bustling town with cafes, guesthouses and easy access to the Triund trail. It’s an excellent place to prepare, rent light gear and sample local food.
what_to_do: Start the trail early to avoid crowds
Visit Bhagsu waterfall before the trek

trek_places.name: Triund Ridge
trek_places.short: Broad grassy ridge with Dhauladhar views
trek_places.about: The ridge is an open meadow area perfect for camping, sunrise and sunset views, and relaxed ridge walks. Camping here feels immediate and rewarding.
